Title: Principal Software Engineer _ Remote Working
Content: We are a Market leader in the water management industry and require a senior software engineer to manage, develop and innovate software platforms to assist with the business growth. Experience of utility billing systems and water supply services would be beneficial. .net, vba C# expereince in migration to Azure platfrom andSelf start person, looking to establish a fast track career path with a proven track record and someone who loves to deliver game-changing software solutions for customers. We assist the world to manage water more efficiently while helping people in developing countries gain access to fresh water and sanitation.
